titleStmt.title: Truths integrity: or, A curious northerne ditty, called, love will finde out the way To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by E. Purslowe?] for F. Coules, dwelling in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and publication date conjectured by STC.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of original in the British Library.
